summary: New company addition. RelFi (relfi.co) is a NJ-based lending marketplace founded Jan 2025, evolved from L3 Funding LLC (est. 2020). Family-run by Blaku brothers. 75+ funders, $220M/mo volume, 25K daily applicants.

companyOverview.founded: January 23, 2025 (LLC registration). Predecessor L3 Funding LLC incorporated September 16, 2020
companyOverview.funding: Bootstrapped â€” no external venture funding identified
companyOverview.sisterCompany: L3 Funding LLC (direct MCA funder, same address, same Blaku family leadership)

metrics.approvalSpeed: Capital within 24 hours; many working capital deals approved within 1 hour
metrics.minimumEligibility: $500K+ annual revenue, 600+ FICO, 1+ year in business

leaders.name: Fitz Blaku
leaders.title: CEO
leaders.background: 20-year technology veteran. Software Architect at L3 predecessor (June 2018), CTO (May 2022), CEO (Jan 2025). Ex-PwC Emerging Technology Strategist (2014-2016). Senior Software Engineer at Relationship Science (2011-2013). Built platforms for ADT, Gilt, One Kings Lane. Harvard Business School Disruptive Strategy credential. Father of two.

leaders.name: Victor Rodriguez
leaders.title: COO
leaders.background: Primary business contact per BBB filing. Manages operations, customer service, partner/ISO relationships. Focus on structuring deals 'larger, faster, and more impactful' than expected.

leaders.name: Kris Blaku
leaders.title: Managing Director, L3 Funding
leaders.background: Managing Director of L3 Funding LLC (direct MCA lender, est. Sept 2020). Offices in NJ and Clearwater, FL. Part of Blaku family fintech operation with brothers Fitz and Lum.

leaders.name: Lum Blaku
leaders.title: VP, Strategy & Growth
leaders.background: Baruch College (CUNY). BDL at Industry Dive (2020-2021), Enterprise BDR at Welcome/Optimizely (2017-2020), BD at Astoria Company (2016-2017). NYC-based.
